# **Overview** {.tabset}

Hello! My name is Ashley Jones and I am a current - soon to be graduate - of the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. On this website, I will store past projects that I still have access to and information about myself; resumes, fun facts, you name it.

In terms of interests, I am interested in pursuing a career in the business field. I am open to ideas, but I would prefer communicating with individuals on a regular basis, whether that be co-workers or customers. Some companies that appeal to me include Newell Brands, JELD-WEN, Stanley Black & Decker, Britax, and Lowe's Corporate.
